metadata.title: CVE-2024-36948 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe/xe_migrate: Cast to output precision before multiplying operandsAddressing potential overflow in result of  multiplication of two lowerprecision (u32) operands before widening it to higher precision(u64).-v2Fix commit message and description. (Rodrigo)(cherry picked from commit 34820967ae7b45411f8f4f737c2d63b0c608e0d7)

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
